## EthersLiquity.getStabilityDeposit() method

Get the current state of a Stability Deposit.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getStabilityDeposit(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<StabilityDeposit>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
